document_data.name: Ebenz Farbough
document_data.mainbody: '''Ebenz Farbough''' was a farmer in the [[Moonsea]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Harried in Hillsfar|9}}
document_data.History:
Ebenz and his wife [[Bea Farbough]] managed a farmhouse near [[Hillsfar]]. When the city's First Lord [[Torin Nomerthal]] proclaimed again the [[Great Law of Humanity]], expelling all non-[[human]]s, Ebenz and Bea decided to house the ten abandoned children living in [[Madame Delilah's Home for Orphaned Children]].

A year later, Bea gave birth to six sons, so things became even more chaotic.

Trouble arrived the year after, ''circa'' [[1486 DR]], when the [[tiefling]] boy [[Pynroth]] disappeared.
